modName: Ukodus - Exchange Absorbed Dragon Souls for Perks
summary: This mod adds a new room to the Tower of Mzark where you can try to solve a randomly generated Sudoku puzzle to exchange a absorbed dragon soul for a perk point ... or die trying.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new room to the Tower of Mzark where you can try to solve a randomly generated Sudoku puzzle to exchange a absorbed dragon soul for a perk point ... or die trying.

The mod requires game version [b]1.8.151[/b] or higher to work.

Installation works like any other mod: Unpack the download into your data directory and tick Ukodus.esp to be loaded.

To remove the mod, just delete the files.

This mod makes some adjustments to the nav mesh inside the Tower of Mzark to accommodate the new door. Thus it will be incompatible with other mods messing with that nav mesh. Besides that, this mod is pretty tame and should be compatible with almost anything.

You may use any part of this mod in your own work without asking for permission. I do not require credit but wouldn\'t be angry if you mention my handle :)
author: Tefnacht
